scripts.build:github: pnpm run build && pnpm --filter demo build:github
scripts.deploy:github: pnpm run build:github && echo '✅ Demo built for GitHub Pages! Push to main branch to deploy.'
scripts.publish:package: pnpm run build && pnpm --filter tps-controls publish
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm run build && echo '✅ Project setup complete!'
scripts.clean:lockfiles: rm -f package-lock.json yarn.lock .yarn.lock && echo '✅ Cleaned conflicting lock files. Run: pnpm install'
scripts.reset: rm -rf node_modules demo/node_modules package/node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm install && echo '✅ Project reset complete!'
